name: SmoothTransitionMenopauseFacts
0:
”Alexa, open Smooth Transition.”
”Alexa, ask Smooth Transition to tell me a menopause fact.”
”Alexa, ask Smooth Transition to give me another fact.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smooth transition
Developer Terms of Use
des: Learn interesting menopause facts from Smooth Transition Menopause Solutions. From the history of menopause to facts you may not even know about, this ever expanding knowledgebase is here to inform you about menopause and dispell certain myths that exist about this natural change to your body. Brought to you by Smooth Transition Menopause Solutions.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
